channel.title: texttospeech on Documentation Spiral Code Studio
channel.description: Recent content in texttospeech on Documentation Spiral Code Studio

item.title: continue
item.description: texttospeech.continue() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Resumes a previous paused speech. Syntax texttospeech.continue()

item.title: enableDebug
item.description: texttospeech.enableDebug() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Enables additional output for debugging purposes. Syntax texttospeech.enableDebug()

item.title: getLanguagesAndVoices
item.description: texttospeech.getLanguagesAndVoices() Type Function Return value getLanguagesAndVoices See also texttospeech.* Overview Returns the getLanguagesAndVoices event with a list of available languages and voices. Syntax texttospeech.getLanguagesAndVoices()

item.title: init
item.description: texttospeech.init() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Must be callled before you try to synthesize any audio. Syntax 1 texttospeech.init([listener]) listener optional Listener. Listener which receives the init event. Syntax 2 texttospeech.init([params]) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call — see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. engine optional~(Android)~ String.

item.title: isSpeaking
item.description: texttospeech.isSpeaking() Type Function Return value Boolean See also texttospeech.* Overview Returns true if currently speaking. Syntax texttospeech.isSpeaking()

item.title: pause
item.description: texttospeech.pause() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Pauses an ongoing speech. Can be resumed by texttospeech.continue() Syntax texttospeech.pause(waitForWordEnd) waitForWordEnd optional Boolean. If true, the speech will be interrupted at the word end. Otherwise the speech will be interrupted immediately.

item.title: speak
item.description: texttospeech.speak() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Generates and plays the speech. This process is not instant and it will take some time before you actually hear the sound. Syntax texttospeech.speak(text, [params]) text required String. The text to be spoken by a speech engine. params optional Table. Contains parameters for the call — see the next section for details.

item.title: stop
item.description: texttospeech.stop() Type Function Return value none See also texttospeech.* Overview Stops an ongoing speech. Syntax texttospeech.stop(waitForWordEnd) waitForWordEnd optional Boolean. If true, the speech will be interrupted at the word end. Otherwise the speech will be interrupted immediately.
